players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and he knows who the mafioso is."
You: "Alice is acting suspiciously and was seen near the scene of the crime last night."
Charlie: "I will investigate Bob next. He has not spoken and was not seen near the crime scene, which could mean he's hiding something."
Bob: "I will keep quiet for now. Let's see what happens in the next night."
You: "Alice's behavior the night of the crime and her accusation towards Bob raises suspicion. Let's keep a close eye on both of them."
